alert.note: Alert for Escambia; Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 16 at 1:05AM EDT until June 16 at 3:45AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR WEST PENSACOLA... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Escambia County in northwestern Florida... Southwestern Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 1205 AM CDT, Intense rainfall has resulted in gauge reports Between 10 and 12 inches of rain across West Pensacola through Warrington and into Gulf Breeze Florida. Additional rainfall amounts of 3 to 5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. Inundation of homes and swift water rescues in low lying areas will be possible over the next few hours as flood waters rapidly rise. This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for West Pensacola. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pensacola, West Pensacola, Warrington, Gulf Breeze, Goulding, Myrtle Grove, Brownsville and Beach Haven. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CATASTROPHIC EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...2-4 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
